title: Growing Plant Feature
description:
`minecraft:growing_plant_feature` places a growing plant in the world. A growing plant is a column that is anchored either to the ceiling or the floor, based on its growth direction.
The growing plant has a body and a head, where the head is the tip of the plant, and the body consists of the remainder blocks.
This feature can be used to define growing plants with variable body and head blocks, e.g. Cave Vines.

items.title: Blocks
items.description: Collection of weighted block descriptor that placement will select from for the plant.

items.title: Weight
items.description: Weight used in random selection. Value is relative to other weights in the collection.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The name of this feature in the form `namespace_name:feature_name`. `feature_name` must match the filename.

age.title: Age
age.description: Age of the head of the plant.

height_distribution.title: Height distribution
height_distribution.description: Collection of weighted heights that placement will select from.

items.title: Height distribution
items.description: Collection of weighted heights that placement will select from.

items.title: Weight
items.description: Weight used in random selection. Value is relative to other weights in the collection.

growth_direction.title: Growth Direction
growth_direction.description: Direction that the plant grows towards. Valid values: UP and DOWN

body_blocks.title: Body Blocks
body_blocks.description: Collection of weighted block descriptor that placement will select from for the body of the plant.

head_blocks.title: Head Blocks
head_blocks.description: Collection of weighted block descriptor that placement will select from for the body of the plant.

allow_water.title: Allow Water
allow_water.description: Plant blocks can be placed in water.
